description: Removes one or more tags from a specified Amazon QLDB resource. You can specify up to 50 tag keys to remove.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) from which to remove the tags. For example: arn:aws:qldb:us-east-1:123456789012:ledger/exampleLedger.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: The list of tag keys to remove. (string) ---
